item.description:
Prayers for Peace

The first Wednesday of every month from 7:30pm – 8:30pm

Center of Light Boston: 200 Amory Street Jamaica Plain, MA 02130 (www.CentersOfLight.org)

On the first Wednesday of every month, the members of all 15 Centers of Light pray for peace, creating a surge of positive energy for people all over the world. Open to all faiths, it is a chance for hearts and minds to make a real difference in the world. People pray for healing, spiritual awakening, love, solutions to hunger crises, war – anything that the world needs in order to become a place of peace. Join us!
item.how_to_find_us: just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the Orange line.
item.name: Prayers for Peace
